description: A former research facility island split between fire and ice after Akainu and Aokiji's battle. Home to Caesar Clown's illegal experiments.

keyEvents.title: Franky vs Baby 5 and Buffalo
keyEvents.description: A major battle takes place on Punk Hazard's icy exterior as Franky defends against the Donquixote Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: The battle prevents Baby 5 and Buffalo from retrieving Caesar Clown.

keyEvents.title: General Cannon Devastates Ice Mountains
keyEvents.description: Franky's General Cannon attack damages Baby 5, Buffalo, and large portions of Punk Hazard's ice mountains.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the destructive power capable of altering the island's landscape.

keyEvents.title: Self-Destruct Button Activated
keyEvents.description: Monet activates Punk Hazard's self-destruct mechanism, causing a massive explosion in the mountain base.
keyEvents.significance: Threatens to destroy the entire island and everyone on it.

statusHistory.reason: Island is threatened by self-destruct explosion

description: A transport chamber within the Third Research Institute, connected between sections B, C, and D. It has a train tunnel called Passage 66 leading to the sea.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Arrives with Handcuffs
keyEvents.description: Usopp arrives in Room R carrying the Sea Stone handcuffs and accompanied by Caesar's former subordinates.
keyEvents.significance: The group gathers in Room R to prepare their escape from the collapsing facility.

keyEvents.title: Momonosuke Sees Petrified Kin'emon
keyEvents.description: Brook brings Kin'emon's petrified body into Room R, shocking Momonosuke.
keyEvents.significance: An emotional moment as the group reunites while preparing to escape.

statusHistory.reason: Serves as gathering point for escape

description: A kingdom ruled by Donquixote Doflamingo, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Known for its passionate culture and living toys.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo's Farewell to Vergo
keyEvents.description: From Dressrosa, Doflamingo contacts Vergo via Den Den Mushi to send his farewells and thanks.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals Doflamingo's location and his emotional connection to his subordinates.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo Orders Island Destruction
keyEvents.description: From Dressrosa, Doflamingo contacts Monet and orders her to activate Punk Hazard's self-destruct mechanism.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Doflamingo orchestrating events from afar and his ruthless strategic decisions.
